songs.title: Cardi B Chopper
songs.lyrics:
Got my thumb coolio on the purge
I think I'm running my city
From the block to the burbs
Dirt bike pop no curve
Cardi b chopper OKURR
Diamonds they heavy
I dont got no balance
Fuck on a bitch
I geek up in her panties
I do the percocets
I dont fuck with xannies
Kids dont do drugs
It will fuck up your sanity
I love my shooters
They always protecting me
Hand on the hammer
Then I get to hammering
I got this cash
To take care of my family
Brother dont got to
Sell hard by the dollar tree
Ooh I’m in my zone...
